About the job
            
 
Management ConsultantVan ‚Äòfinancial economic crime‚Äô tot ‚Äòdigital transformation‚Äô. En van ‚Äòtarget operating models‚Äô tot ‚Äòpost-merger integration‚Äô trajecten. Onder deze termen schuilt een fascinerende wereld die blijft verrassen. Een wereld waarin er altijd iets nieuws te ontdekken is. Delta Capita helpt banken, verzekeraars, pensioenfondsen en toezichthouders om slim in te spelen op de veranderingen van een financi√´le markt die zich in razend tempo ontwikkelt.Als management consultant begeleid je klanten bij uiteenlopende vraagstukken. Denk aan het realiseren van een effici√´ntere operatie bij een bank, het integreren van bedrijfsonderdelen of de implementatie van een nieuw pensioenstelsel bij een pensioenuitvoerder. Jij stuurt het team aan en bent verantwoordelijk voor een succesvolle oplevering van de opdracht. De casussen zijn uitdagend en de structuren zijn complex. Precies zoals wij het graag hebben.Bij Delta Capita werk je in een hecht team van bevlogen en internationale collega‚Äôs. Collega‚Äôs die het beste van zichzelf √©n van jou vragen. Al onze teamleden krijgen dan ook veel vrijheid en verantwoordelijkheid in de invulling van hun werk. Wij geven je de ruimte om √©cht het verschil te maken.Onze mensen vormen de kracht van Delta Capita. De talenten, toewijding en passie van ons hele team bepalen het succes van onze organisatie. Daarom zorgen wij graag goed voor al onze collega‚Äôs. We willen een werkplek bieden waarin verschillen gevierd worden en iedereen zich thuis voelt. Een plek waar jij alle mogelijkheden hebt om je volledige potentieel te verkennen en realiseren. We werken hard, maar maken ook tijd voor gezelligheid met borrels, prikkelende teamactiviteiten en legendarische teamuitjes.Haal het beste uit jezelf bij Delta CapitaLeren, ontwikkelen en steeds beter worden in wat je doet. Bij Delta Capita gaan we er niet vanuit dat dat vanzelf gaat. Samen met jouw manager bepaal je tijdens regelmatige contactmomenten persoonlijke ontwikkelingsdoelstellingen. Hoe je die behaalt? Onder andere met behulp van onze geaccrediteerde Delta Capita Academy, interne kennissessies, en trainingen zowel vanuit onze wereldwijde organisatie als externe partijen.De Financial Times noemde Delta Capita een van de snelst groeiende bedrijven van Europa. We zijn een scale-up die n√©t een beetje anders opereert dan de traditionele consultancybureaus. Onze organisatie kent weinig lagen en is wars van hi√´rarchie en bureaucratie. We bieden dus veel vrijheid en meer dan genoeg kansen om snel te groeien. Wij houden van ondernemende geesten en geven je veel ruimte om initiatieven te ontplooien en het beste uit jezelf te halen.Delta Capita is een internationale organisatie. Ons hoofdkantoor staat in Londen, maar we hebben ook vestigingen in onder andere Singapore, Dublin, Frankfurt, Hong Kong, New York en natuurlijk Amsterdam. Bij ons heb je dan ook de mogelijkheid om opdrachten te doen die de grens over gaan.Waar staan wij voor?Reinventing the financial services value chain. Dat is waar Delta Capita dagelijks aan werkt. Wij geloven in een vernieuwde financi√´le sector. Een sector die bijdraagt aan een duurzamere wereld om haar klanten beter van dienst te kunnen zijn. Om dat te realiseren, ontwikkelen en implementeren wij nieuwe producten en diensten die de status quo uitdagen en verandering veroorzaken in de sector.In onze wereldwijde organisatie staan diversiteit en inclusiviteit hoog in het vaandel.Met vestigingen op drie continenten zijn wij een multicultureel bedrijf dat de kracht kent van uiteenlopende perspectieven, achtergronden en levenservaringen. Samen excelleren voor een betere wereld. Daar geloven wij in.Onze kernwaardenMet lef, daadkracht en professionaliteit werkt Delta Capita samen om betere uitkomsten te realiseren. We zijn betrokken in ons werk, direct in onze communicatie en leren en innoveren snel. Zo zetten we verandering in gang en overtreffen we de verwachtingen van onze klanten in alles wat we doen.Wie ben jij? Master diploma behaald, bij voorkeur in business, economics of financeMinstens 3 tot 7 jaar werkervaring, bij voorkeur in de consultancy en/of financi√´le sectorVloeiend Nederlands en Engels, zowel in geschrift als mondelingOndernemend en met een passie voor vernieuwen, verbeteren en innoverenCommunicatief vaardig. Op professioneel niveau kun je omgaan met mensen uit alle levels van een organisatieAffiniteit met coaching en een positieve drive die je goed kunt overbrengen op de rest van het teamSterke analytische vaardigheden en oog voor detailStreeft altijd naar een maximale teamprestatie
Wat bieden wij? Een salaris tussen de 4000 en 7000 euro per maand excl. vakantiegeld, afhankelijk van jouw jaren werkervaring en senioriteitDe keuze voor een contract van 32 tot 40 uur26 vakantiedagen per jaarDe mogelijkheid om deels thuis te werken, inclusief faciliteiten voor een thuiswerkplekEen jaarlijkse prestatiebonus, op basis van bedrijfsresultaten en je eigen prestatieKeuze tussen een NS-business card of een kilometervergoedingGoede pensioenregelingToegang tot een uitgebreid, internationaal learning & development programma met ruimte voor individuele ontwikkelingstrajecten
Waarom Delta Capita?  Informele organisatiestructuur met korte lijnen waarin je de vrijheid hebt om jouw eigen kansen te cre√´ren en snel door te groeienEen gezellig team met internationale en ambitieuze collega‚ÄôsEen kantoor in Amsterdam met alle faciliteiten om optimaal te kunnen presterenRuimte om tijd te besteden aan goede doelen en andere initiatieven die een positief effect hebben op de samenlevingDe mogelijkheid om een sabbatical op te nemenAandacht voor financial & mental well-being

About the job
            
 
Competitive business today is all about making intelligent, informed decisions. As a consultant within EY-Parthenon you will help make that happen. EY-Parthenon is a leading advisory organization focused on strategy consulting. We are committed to combining our unconventional thinking with our clients‚Äô smarts to deliver actionable strategies. Commercial strategy team is the specialized practice within EY-Parthenon, serving local and international private equity clients, their portfolio companies, and corporate clients from commercial due diligence to go-to-market and long-term growth strategies.The opportunityEY-Parthenon Commercial strategy practice provides investment and acquisition guidance through commercial due diligence work and strategic advice to companies and investors across such sectors as Technology, Media & Telecom, Retail & Consumer Goods, Healthcare, Energy and Financial Services. We support our clients realize their growth ambitions. You can expect to work on such strategy projects as commercial due diligence, growth strategy, new market entry, pricing and commercial excellence. Our team in the Netherlands is part of a global network with offices in Germany, UK, Nordics and the US.The EY-Parthenon team in the Netherlands is uniquely positioned in the intersection of strategy and technology, offering Software Strategy, Emerging Technologies Strategy and Digital Transformation services. As an integrated team, we are exposed to the cutting-edge tech market dynamics and engage in truly creative and thought-provoking projects.We are looking for colleagues to join us in Amsterdam as their home office. As a member of our vibrant and tech-savvy team, you‚Äôll have a unique opportunity to develop your career through a broad scope of engagements, mentoring and formal learning.What You‚Äôll DoSenior Consultants are the backbone of our case teams and are responsible for leading workstreams and contributing to overall engagements, translating client needs into project tasks and deliverables. Senior Consultants manage and execute day-to-day team analytical activities and serve as key liaisons between junior and senior team members and our clients. On any given day, you may conduct market research, interview industry participants, meet with company executives, conduct qualitative and quantitative analysis, or participate in client discussions.Our teams work on a variety of client issues. The assignments range from development of long-term growth, go-to-market and digital-focused strategies to evaluation of potential acquisitions of businesses through commercial due diligence. You will gain experience in creating data-backed analysis and insights, hone your ability to craft a compelling narrative and present findings to senior executives, and manage and mentor others on your team. You will have a seat at the table with CEOs and investors, helping these clients make more informed decisions and gaining first-hand insights into how investors and management teams operate and make decisions.You will: Support development of commercial strategies using tools such as market analysis, customer & competitor research, macroeconomic forecasting and portfolio optimizationReview and manage deal documents to identify critical commercial issues and risks related to a proposed transactionWork in project teams to deliver high quality output that addresses our client‚Äôs most pressing challenges and questionsPerform commercial analyses and translate findings into recommendations, being able to present outcomes to C-level executives and investment professionals Contribute to business development by preparing project proposals
What Working At EY-Parthenon OffersWe offer a diverse, ambitious, international and fun team. A competitive compensation package where you‚Äôll be rewarded based on your performance and recognized for the value you bring to our business. Plus, we offer: Unmatched opportunity to further develop your strategic thinking, sector knowledge and international network. You‚Äôll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues in the industryWorking in the champions league of deals with the world's leading companies ‚Äì our clientsThe freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that‚Äôs right for youOpportunity to contribute to the next growth wave of our fast-growing business 
Skills And Attributes For Success Interest in strategy consulting with focus on M&A related topicsGoal-oriented with strong aptitude for quantitative and qualitative analysis and determination to deliver exceptional resultsCurious team player with the ability to adapt to changing requirements or deadlines in support of our clients‚Äô goals
To qualify for the role you must have Minimum three years of strategy consulting experience or equivalent with strong track record in commercial due diligence and growth strategy workMaster‚Äôs degree in Economics, Engineering or Business Administration with outstanding academic results and coursework relevant to the positionDemonstrated interest in strategy and M&A through internships, extracurricular activities or research on the subjectStrong analytical and problem-solving skills with a practical ability to dissect underlying market and company performance drivers Ability to perform detailed commercial assessments of markets, competitors and customers by leveraging secondary and primary research toolingExcellent communication skills, both verbal and written, in Dutch and English Effective organization and time management skills with ability to work in a fast-paced environmentWillingness and ability to travel, when necessary (approximately 0-20%)

About the job
            
 
Ben jij nu een strategie-consultant en mis je impact? Gloednieuw team, dat de link legt tussen strategie en operatie, zoekt versterking om hun propositie verder vorm te geven en uit te bouwen. Unieke kans voor een consultant die graag bij een grote naam werkt, maar tegelijkertijd graag meebouwt.Over de opdrachtgeverDeze trusted advisor voor toonaangevende klanten binnen operations management consulting is de afgelopen jaren flink gegroeid. Inmiddels is dit adviesbureau internationaal vertegenwoordigd en heeft het een sterke marktpositie en trackrecord. Naast het verbeteren van de operational performance, vragen hun klanten steeds vaker hulp bij strategische uitdagingen. Daarom trok dit adviesbureau een senior partner aan met veel kennis van strategie consulting, om de propositie Strategy & Transformation verder te laten groeien.Het Strategy & Transformation team is de schakel tussen de businessstrategie en operations. Zij geloven niet in papierwerk en zorgen ervoor dat een strategie ook in de praktijk werkt door vanaf de start nauw samen te werken met hun klanten. Ze denken niet alleen in ‚Äòwat‚Äô, maar ook in ‚Äòhoe‚Äô om tot een daadwerkelijke en realistische executie over te gaan. Dit team is sterk in het vertalen van de businessstrategie naar een operationsstrategie, het defini√´ren van een businessarchitectuur en het vormgeven van een transformatie.Inmiddels werken er meer dan 600 gedreven consultants bij dit groeiende adviesbureau in Europa en in de UK. Door hun pragmatische werkwijze helpen zij toonaangevende klanten in topconditie te krijgen en klaar te stomen voor de toekomst. Denk aan Heineken, Rituals, Alliander en de NS. Ondanks hun groei heerst er een platte, betrokken en informele cultuur. Consultants zijn resultaatgericht, pragmatisch, no-nonsense en hebben veel oog voor de mens. Het Strategy & Transformation team bestaat momenteel uit vijf consultants.Over de functieAls Strategy & Transformation consultant in het gloednieuwe team lever jij een belangrijke bijdrage aan het succesvol neerzetten van projecten bij klanten. Je voert een analyse uit om de performance van de klant en marktontwikkelingen in kaart te brengen. Vervolgens help je de stip op de horizon te bepalen, de performance te verbeteren en je klant klaar te maken voor de toekomst. In deze rol acteer je op strategisch niveau en leg je de koppeling met de operatie. Je schakelt dus op topniveau √©n bent met de operatie in contact om vanaf de start draagvlak te cre√´ren en de medewerkers mee te nemen in de verandering. Naast het oppakken en uitrollen van projecten lever je een belangrijke bijdrage aan de groei van dit bedrijfsonderdeel. Tot slot coach je (junior)consultants en begeleid je hen in hun persoonlijke ontwikkeling.Kortom, mooie strategie-executierol voor een consultant waarin je op strategisch niveau start, langdurige resultaten bij klanten neerzet en kan meebouwen aan een practice.Belangrijkste criteria Je hebt minstens 5 jaar advieservaring bij een gerenommeerd adviesbureau. Je hebt vwo, een wo-bachelor en master afgerond met interessante nevenactiviteiten. Je bent analytisch en communicatief ijzersterk, weet materie snel eigen te maken, processen en vraagstukken goed te doorgronden. Je hebt ervaring en een netwerk binnen logistiek, retail, FS, infrastructuur, manufacturing of energie. Je hebt ervaring met het coachen en trainen van collega‚Äôs, daarnaast is je stakeholdermanagement uitstekend. Je weet draagvlak te cre√´ren (van directie tot de werkvloer) en werknemers in beweging te krijgen. 
Reden van de vacatureKlanten vragen steeds vaker om strategisch advies.. Nieuw geformeerd team springt daarop in en legt de link tussen de strategie en operatie. Om verdere groei te kunnen verwezenlijken binnen deze business unit zoekt onze opdrachtgever extra talent.De procedureNa een gesprek bij Badenoch + Clark volgen er drie bij deze opdrachtgever. Een business case en online assessment maken onderdeel uit van de procedure.ContactSpreekt deze rol je aan en voldoe je aan de criteria? Dan horen we graag van je. Solliciteer via de knop op deze pagina of stuur je cv en korte motivatie naar Merel Fennema (merel.fennema@badenochandclark.nl).

job_title: Management Consultant to Capgemini Invent Business Technology - Graduate and Young Professional (Copenhagen and Aarhus)
job_description:
About the job
            
 
Do you want to jumpstart your career and get real hands-on experience of developing new digital solutions and business models of the future?Capgemini Invent is looking for ambitious and inventive graduates and young professionals to join our Business Technology-team in Denmark. As a Consultant at Capgemini Invent you will, together in a team, advise global business leaders and clients in major digital transformation projects.The Business Technology team has an inventive approach to digital transformation, helping to identify and implement disruptive services, platforms, architecture, and operating models that modern enterprises need to deliver real-business value securely, at scale, and with sustainability at the core.What can you expect? Working in a diverse environment and collaborating with our market-leading clients and experienced consultants.Joining a fast-growing firm on its continuing transformation journey and becoming part of a consulting powerhouse.Experience rapid learning, a well-defined career path, and support to develop into a successful consultant. In addition, you will benefit from training and mentoring programs to support your development.Capgemini Invent stands out with our collaborative culture and people, skilled professionals, industry expertise and comprehensive end-to-end capabilities within our Group.Embrace a culture where employees shape their own future. Enjoy a welcoming, social workplace with many exciting events and activities.
The person we wish to invite to join our mission: Holds a Master‚Äôs degree, with strong academic records, within e.g., Business, Engineering, Data, Computer Science, Technology or Innovation.Graduating during 2024, or recently graduated and holds 1-3 years of relevant work experience.Demonstrates exceptional analytical problem-solving skills, a creative mindset, and a passion for genuine innovation.Possesses an entrepreneurial drive for creating change and an insatiable thirst for learning.Excels in collaborative efforts and is comfortable working independently.Quickly grasps client business matters and is passionate about future trends.Holds excellent communication skills in Danish and English.In addition, international and professional experiences as well as extracurricular activities are seen as meriting.
We welcome you to join in Fall 2024, and you will be located in one of our offices in Denmark; Copenhagen or Aarhus , but with readiness to travel and work on projects at our client sites.If you have already graduated and hold relevant work experience after graduation, we welcome you to join us during Spring 2024.Does this sound like a great opportunity, are you ready to get the future you want?Seats are filled on an ongoing basis; we encourage you to apply as soon as possible! Apply by sending your CV and application in English and official University transcripts and High School grades. Please state clearly in your application your expected graduation date and to which office(s) you are applying. Please note that only complete applications are considered.About Capgemini Invent and the GroupAs the digital innovation, design and transformation powerhouse and brand of the Capgemini Group, Capgemini Invent enables CxOs to envision and shape the future of their businesses. Located in nearly 40 studios and more than 60 offices around the world, it comprises a 13,000+ strong team of strategists, data scientists, technologists, product and experience designers and brand experts developing new digital services, products, experiences and business models for sustainable growth.Capgemini Invent is an integral part of Capgemini, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 370,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2022 global revenues of ‚Ç¨ 22 billion, up +21.1% vs 2021.We are very much looking forward to hearing from you!Read more about us at: https://www.capgemini.com/about-us/who-we-are/our-brands/capgemini-invent/Here you can find what our fantastic employees say about us in our employee stories: https://www.capgemini.com/se-en/careers/career-at-invent/#LI-DNI

About the job
            
 
Job Title: Senior Strategy Execution Consultant, up to ‚Ç¨80,000, Hybrid 2 days a week in office!Must speak English and Dutch Company Description:Our client is a leading global strategy company specialising in helping organizations execute their strategic initiatives effectively. With a presence in major cities worldwide, our client partners with businesses across various industries to deliver impactful strategies and drive successful execution.They are renowned for their deep expertise, innovative approach, and commitment to achieving tangible results for their clients. To further strengthen their Amsterdam office, they are currently seeking a highly experienced and dynamic Senior Strategy Consultant.Job Responsibilities: Provide expert guidance and support to clients in developing and executing their strategic plans and initiatives.Lead end-to-end strategy execution projects, ensuring alignment between overall business objectives and implementation roadmaps.Conduct thorough analysis of client organizations, market dynamics, and competitive landscapes to identify key improvement areas and formulate actionable recommendations.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop implementation plans, establishing objectives, timelines, and required resources.Facilitate executive-level workshops and meetings to drive strategic decision-making and foster alignment among stakeholders.Monitor project progress, identify potential risks or issues, and proactively recommend course corrections to ensure successful execution.
Qualifications: Proven experience (at least 4+ years) in strategic planning, strategy execution, or management consulting, preferably in a global consulting firm.Must have good business acumen.Fluent in English and Dutch.Strong track record of successfully leading end-to-end strategy execution projects, driving tangible results and creating value for clients.Deep understanding of strategic frameworks and methodologies, with the ability to apply them in a practical and results-oriented manner.Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to synthesize complex information and present it in a clear and concise manner.Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas to diverse stakeholders, including C-suite executives.Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and deliver within strict deadlines.Proactive mindset, with the ability to anticipate client needs, identify opportunities for improvement, and drive continuous process enhancements.Collaborative and team-oriented approach, with the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams and foster a positive working environment.
If you are a seasoned strategy professional looking to make a significant impact by helping organizations execute their strategic initiatives successfully, this role offers the perfect opportunity to further develop your career within a global strategy company.Apply now and join a dynamic team of experts dedicated to driving growth and delivering exceptional results.

About the job
            
 
The Sustainability Strategy Practice is a part of Accenture Strategy and focuses on the CEO‚Äôs most strategic priorities. We help organizations embed sustainability into every area of their businesses to enable them to unlock greater value through responsible transformations.We provide you with a great learning ground, deep-rooted in Sustainable Strategy, where you will get an opportunity to advise to and work with our key global clients, driving end-to-end transformation and business growth. We also work with global organizations such as the World Economic Forum, the United Nations Global Compact, World Bank Group, and World Business Council for Sustainable Development.What will you do?Sustainable Business Strategy: Work closely with clients to understand their vision and help them embed sustainability into their strategy and operations (through deep expertise in areas such as low-carbon energy transitions, circular business models, sustainable technology, innovation and sustainability value assessment)Value Driven Business Models: Support clients in delivering 360-degree value (i.e., delivering on financial metrics while creating positive socio-environmental impact)Develop Sustainability Roadmaps: Develop business case and implementation road maps to shape clients‚Äô transformation journey to achieve sustainability related goalsIndustry Partner Alliances: Work with organizations such as UN, WEF, FICCI and prominent business leaders to shape industry leading thought capitalStrategic mindsetConsulting experienceStructured problem solving and sharp analytical skillsAbility to describe complex processes and concepts in a non-technical, end user- friendly manner and languageAbility to analyze data and draw conclusionsAbility to develop compelling client ready deliverables (MS Power Point, Excel, Word)Strong Sustainability acumen and interest is a mustMin 2 years of experience in Sustainability areasWillingness to travel (incl. Middle East)Working proficiency in English (additional language is an asset)Knowledge of one of the below Sustainability spaces is preferred: ESG reporting (company diagnosis in the ESG context, awareness of the latest ESG regulations, knowledge of non-financial reporting standards, experience in preparation of ESG reports is a plus) Sustainable Finance (experience in financial sector - preferably in the Sustainability Finance area, Green Investments, financing of green technologies)Working Conditions:Employment contract (Umowa o pracƒô) Headquarter in‚ÄØWarsaw with offices in Krak√≥w, Wroc≈Çaw, ≈Å√≥d≈∫ and Gda≈Ñsk. We are delivering our work remotely but also knowing that Intelligent Consulting Hub Europe (ICH) way of working is also based on traveling and serving advisory, typically working closely with our Clients in their offices, willingness and ability to work at client‚Äôs locations mostly across Europe and Middle East for short or long term is also required. What we offer:Challenging job in a dynamic, professional, international and multicultural environment Opportunity to gain exceptional skills, knowledge and experience on large scale international projects The unique chance to work in a global network using only state-of-the-art tools and technologies One of a kind experiences with best know-how, with broad access to certifications and professional industry-recognized trainings. Very attractive and competitive salary as well as a well-defined career path shaped to the individuals career focus & priorities Attractive benefits package: Remote/Hybrid way of work, Strategy college (trainnings in Europe), Cafeteria System, Multisport card, Lunch card, Private medical care, Employee Assistance Program, AMEX Gold Card, Lounge Club Priority Pass, Life insurance, Employee referral program and much more‚Ä¶ If this sounds like the ideal role, career and company for you, please apply online as soon as possible.Intelligent Consulting Hub is a part of Europe Strategy & Consulting practice, pulling together multinational and cross-cultural professionals based at key locations across Europe. No matter what business, no matter where in the world, our unrivaled industry and function experts help our Clients to shape the future creating clearly defined, measurable value. We are delivering on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Our Poland part of ICH Consulting Hub is located in Warsaw, Krak√≥w, Wroc≈Çaw, ≈Å√≥d≈∫ and Gda≈Ñsk. Your impact will be truly global as you will leverage an unmatched network of people, knowledge, tools and technologies and work alongside some of the best thinkers in the market.‚ÄúJoin our world class capabilities‚ÄØand experience unique opportunities to grow your skills with us.‚Äù ‚Äì Ma≈Çgorzata Nasi≈Çowska, ICH Consulting Hub LeadAccenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. With our thought leadership and culture of innovation, we apply industry expertise, diverse skill sets and next-generation technology to each business challenge.We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.‚ÄúAcross the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.‚Äù ‚Äì Julie Sweet, Accenture CEOWhen applying please enclose the below statements:"I hereby express my consent to process my personal data included in my job offer by Accenture Sp. z o.o. or any other entity of the Accenture group for recruitment purposes and once the recruitment process is closed, I agree that Accenture Sp. z o.o. with its registered seat in Warsaw, 00-121, ul. Sienna 39 or any other entity of Accenture group places and processes my personal data in its database. I also express my consent to sending my personal data to third parties within the Accenture group pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act of May 10, 2018 on the Protection of Personal Data (Journal of Laws of 2018, item 1000). I submit the data voluntarily. I have been informed about the right of access to the content of my data and about the possibility of correcting them."Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.Please be advised that only selected candidates will be contacted.LocationsKrakow,Lodz,Warsaw,Wroclaw,Gdansk

About the job
            
 
Can‚Äôt wait to make an impact on the world? You‚Äôre not alone. Join us in driving progress in the working world and beyond. Your journey with us As a member of our Strategy and Performance team, you will help our clients to address business-critical issues, and support management teams in finding solutions to answering complex strategic dilemmas. Based on thorough market research and our strong strategic methodologies, you advise SME‚Äôs in the different strategic options to face the challenges of today and tomorrow.You will contribute to a wide range of projects across various industries, helping our clients cope with the challenges they are facing, linked to the corporate, sustainability, customer and/or digital strategy of the SME;Build strong market knowledge in order to obtain a strong sector understand to give clients insights in market trends, which will affect their current business;Provide our clients with a forward-looking view of the most important strategic topics affecting them; Support the client in determining its strategy and defining the right set of initiatives & projects to execute upon this strategy;You will advise family owned (private) companies with their growth challenges, transformation or international ambitions; the majority of the clients are located in Wallonia and Brussels; you will work with the management team and very often the owner of the company; Scope and deliver engagements, including leading the approach, liaising with stakeholders, and directing activities of people on the project team;Provide professional development opportunities and feedback for junior team members;Challenge the management of the companies with a critical mindset and based on strong (market) analysis;Prepare with the team market research and workshops; being able to facilitate workshops with management; delivering high quality strategic report based on a thorough understanding of the client challenges and profound (market) analysis.
 Let‚Äôs talk about youSuccessful candidates will have a degree from a top-tier academic institution, have minimum 5 years of relevant business experience, and the ability to meet each of the following criteria: Excellent academic credentials for both undergraduate and graduate coursework, MBA is a plus;A minimum of 5 years of previous work experience with a top consultancy practice, strategy house in SME market or internal strategy teams within a large companyHaving a strong affinity and interest in family owned (private) companiesProven track record in dealing with growth and transformation issues/strategies such as market expansion, customer insights, profitability management, etc.;Outstanding interpersonal and communication skills (including presentations), both written and verbal;Leadership qualities, project management skills, and people management and development skills with a strong focus on team development;Have a creative mind set, dare to think out of the box with an analytical touch;Ability to lead and direct cross functional teams;Strong skills to work with MS Powerpoint and MS Excel;Fluency in French & English, preferably also in Dutch 
Personal Qualities Valued: Intellectually powerful and agile: curious, pragmatic, rigorous, and creative;Be able to set up partnerships with colleagues and stakeholders. Be a trusted advisor, who is comfortable with working on difficult issues where there can be no definitive ‚Äúright‚Äù answer; patient in the face of uncertainty, complexity and ambiguity;Capable of working on multiple, overlapping tasks in a fast-paced environment;Able to take initiative and make things happen with moderate supervision and guidance.
 Accounting¬†is so much more than hard numbers. Think analysis, critical insights, problem-solving and strategic planning. The magic happens when analysis and insight meld. It‚Äôs what turns accountants into trusted advisors who use regulatory compliance and reporting to create opportunities and manage risk for our clients. At Deloitte, we advise a wide range of companies across multidisciplinary services ranging from accounting, tax, legal, mergers and acquisitions to services such as ‚Äúbusiness control & technology‚Äù and ‚Äústrategy & growth‚Äù tailor-made solutions. At the same time, our team of advisors handles cases with a satellite vision, enthusiasm and know-how. Part of the Accountancy family, the Strategy & Performance team offers family businesses & SME's clear strategic directions, monitor their businesses and transform their operations. Think analysis, critical insights, problem-solving and strategic planning. The magic happens when analysis and actions meld, to bring organizations to the next level. It's what turns Deloitte into a trusted advisor. Who is Deloitte? World-leading professional services firm, we offer value added services in audit & assurance, risk advisory, accounting, tax & legal, consulting and financial advisory. +6000 dedicated professionals, active in +10 offices throughout the country, take great pride in supporting our clients with multidisciplinary expertise, industry knowledge, and innovative solutions. ¬†We offer services to a wide variety of clients, from national and international companies, small, fast-growing and large organizations to public institutions and governmental authorities.Why Deloitte? Be the true you!¬†We foster diversity and inclusion and encourage you to bring your authentic self to work. Explore, question and collaborate while building a career that inspires and energises you. Never stop growing! Diversity of thought makes us stronger. At Deloitte, we tailor a personalized learning experience, offering you the opportunity to grow at your own pace and achieve maximum impact. We practice what we preach! As a Purpose-led organisation, at the heart of everything we do is a set of timeless principles and¬†unifying values.Life looks different for each of us, so we created a varied benefits package that you can tap into:  My Benefits My Choice, a flexible rewards plan tailored to your lifestyle and prioritiesSustainable transport options offered by¬†Mobility@Deloitte Flexible work arrangements for all and initiatives supported by¬†Parents@Deloitte Wellbeing tips and activities powered by¬†Energise@Deloitte Topped off with other health benefits and insurance opportunities
Empowering our employees with¬†flexible work arrangements¬†remains essential in today's reality:  Hybrid workplace:¬†combination of home office and on-site (+10 offices in Belgium or client's premises). Part-time employment: all our jobs are open to part-time work under a 90% or 80% regime.
Join us to make an impact together! Apply now!

About the job
            
 
This is the challenge.At The Cocktail we look for people without fear for speed. Specifically, someone capable of understanding technology challenges and translating them to our clients, helping them to move in the right direction. Our Strategy Consultants manage end-to-end projects for different industries (retail, travel, financial services‚Ä¶) from a perspective which is far from traditional consulting.In your day to day you will:  You will help develop end-to-end digital transformation projects.You will identify problems and formulate hypotheses leveraging resources and know-how from The Cocktail, and you will articulate the conclusions in executive documents.You will participate in dynamics and workshops to involve clients in The Cocktail's creative and solution process.You will immerse yourself in the day-to-day activities of our clients to better understand aspects of their culture, organization, and processes, in order to draw valuable conclusions.You will work in multidisciplinary teams, collaborating closely with members of our UX, UI, Brand, Data, Technology teams, etc., for the implementation of new products and services.You will identify client needs that may lead to new business proposals.
The ideal candidate: 2-3 years of relevant experience in a Strategy & Operations Consulting firmsGood presentation and Excel skills are requiredWilling to navigate start-up fast-paced environmentsAutonomous, energetic and proactivity when facing new disruptive challenges; clear focus on getting things doneAppetite for digital ecosystemsFluency in English - Level C1/C2
Working at The Cocktail: Flexibility and confidence. Our working model is based on self-responsibility and autonomy with flexible hours that can help you maintain your work-life balance. You can choose to work fully remote, hybridly or on site in our offices. In any case, we provide financial and material aid to cover your remote work needs, we let you choose a laptop with the operating system that you prefer.Multinational and multicultural. We are an international company present in more than 90 markets. We have offices in Madrid, Oviedo, London, Colombia, Mexico and an international network provided by Wunderman Thompson.Soul and purpose: we have initiatives to support motherhood (nursing room in the office, mom&dad program), sustainability (zero waste policies and projects dedicated to the SDGs) and the inclusion of generational diversity, gender diversity and functional diversity.Opportunities for growth and training. Personal and professional development go hand to hand and they are key for us. We offer a long term career plan with training in soft and hard skills. We offer language classes both in English and Spanish. There is an international route for those who consider a multi-country career.Health and wellness. Health comes first, that‚Äôs why we take care of your physical and psychological wellbeing with a private medical insurance with full coverage as well as LikeWorks, our psychological assistance platform which can provide you and your family member‚Äôs assistance and advice on different topics 24/7. In addition, if you stop by our office in Madrid you can have a medical or physiotherapy appointment inside our building. And of course, we ensure rest with 25 well-deserved holidays per year, with the possibility of adding 2 more for Christmas Eve and New Year‚Äôs eve, and if it‚Äôs not enough, you can add up to 5 more days of extra time.Offers, savings and other benefits. You can save on restaurants, child care, transport or medical insurance for your family with our flexible remuneration program. You can also take advantage of economic incentives for bringing candidates and clients, and special prices on travel and technology products..
At The Cocktail we intend to be a reference in talent and human quality, and we will only achieve it by being an open and diverse company, which is why we have a Code of Conduct that reflects our expectations of the people who work with us. We offer a welcoming environment for everyone, regardless of their gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, nationality, religion, socioeconomic status‚Ä¶Next steps:If you‚Äôve come this far it‚Äôs because we‚Äôve managed to get your attention üòâSign up for the offer and our People team will take a look at your resume. If it matches with what we are looking for, you will receive a call so that we can tell you more about The Cocktail and this role.Our recruitment processes usually have around two or three interviews, and it is possible that at some point we will want to see you in action and propose you a technical challenge.At the end of the process we will talk about the salary conditions of the role, once we get to know you better and know how much you can contribute.If you need a tip for the process: we simply want you to be yourself.Will you join us?

About the job
            
 
‚ÄûWir sind ein innovatives und dynamisches Team, das kundenzentrierte Beratung mit einer Can-Do-Mentalit√§t verbindet.‚ÄúWir wollen gemeinsam mit dir zusammen Marketing-Organisationen nachhaltig transformieren.Wie wir das erreichen? Unser Ziel ist es, Unternehmen in den Fokus ihrer Konsument*innen zu r√ºcken und datenbasiertes Wachstum zu generieren. Daf√ºr begleiten wir unsere Kund*innen ganzheitlich: von der Strategiekonzeption bis hin zur erfolgreichen Umsetzung.Was das f√ºr uns bedeutet? Wir entwerfen kundenzentrierte Strategien und schaffen mithilfe einer effektiven Technologie- und Datenarchitektur sowie durch Datenanalysen messbaren Erfolg. About the job
            
 
Our PurposeWe work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team ‚Äì one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.Title And SummaryPersonalization Strategy ConsultantWho is Mastercard?Mastercard is a global technology company in the payments industry. Our mission is to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart, and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments, and businesses realize their greatest potential.Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. With connections across more than 210 countries and territories, we are building a sustainable world that unlocks priceless possibilities for all.Dynamic Yield, by Mastercard is on the lookout for a Personalization Strategy Consultant, charged with building personalization programs on behalf of our enterprise clients. We‚Äôre looking for experienced professionals, who are able to analyse and interpret e-commerce data from different sources and derive the right insights from this data to create an actionable and impactful strategic personalization program. As an outstanding communicator, our Personalization Strategy Consultant will present and refine those Personalization Strategies together with E-Commerce experts and Executives and also visualise and quantify the impact of their program for our clients.The right traits for the job include an analytical mindset, a good understanding of success factors across digital businesses from different industries, and a consultative approach with a customer centric mindset.As a part of our Professional Services team, the role will build and analyze reports, drive insights and recommend strategic plans that unlock business growth for our clients. In this role, cross functional collaboration will be expected in order to successfully collaborate and communicate with Sales Leadership, Marketing, Product and Engineering teams. The ultimate goal is to become a trusted advisor across multiple teams to provide strategic consulting, insight, and strategy to ensure growth for Dynamic Yield‚Äôs customer base.The Task-at-Hand  Perform sophisticated quantitative analyses (Google Analytics, Omniture, Tableau) that translates eCommerce data into actionable personalization strategy Coordinate and lead cross-functional teams to advance project execution based on the strategic plan Analyze and track progress against the plan and report back on the success of the program Advocate for personalization and lead clients toward adopting advanced personalization strategies Innovate on new ways of leveraging Dynamic Yield‚Äôs technology to create personalized customer experiences across different industry verticals Act as the main personalization strategy expert in front of executives in high profile clients and partners
Optimal Skills For Success  3+ years of consulting experience focusing UX optimization in eCommerce, media or finance sector is a must B.A./B.S. Degree (MBA strongly preferred Business fluency in English and German is a must Proven experience in campaign management, execution and reporting Exemplary quantitative and qualitative thinking, analytical ability, and problem-solving skills Strong desire to learn and grow within a fast-paced business environment Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with excellent presentation skills Strong interest in digital technology Ecommerce technology (e.g. CMS, Web Analytics, Email Marketing) experience, knowledge, or aptitude a plus
Corporate Security Responsibility All activities involving access to Mastercard assets, information, and networks comes with an inherent risk to the organization and, therefore, it is expected that every person working for, or on behalf of, Mastercard is responsible for information security and must: Abide by Mastercard‚Äôs security policies and practices;Ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the information being accessed;Report any suspected information security violation or breach, andComplete all periodic mandatory security trainings in accordance with Mastercard‚Äôs guidelines.

About the job
            
 
Wat ga je doen?Als Business Consultant bij Enexis help je √©en van de grote Nederlandse netbeheerders bedrijfsprocessen optimaal in te richten, een cruciale rol in een organisatie die zich middenin de energietransitie begeeft. Belangrijk in deze functie is vooral dat je niet alleen scherp krijgt waaraan n√π behoefte is, maar ook over een paar jaar. Over uitdagingen gesproken... Durf jij ‚Äòm aan? Zo ga jij deze uitdaging aan...Als Business Consultant bij Enexis help je √©en van de grote Nederlandse netbeheerders bedrijfsprocessen optimaal in te richten: Dat begint met uitzoeken van wat nou precies 'optimaal' is. Daarvoor heb je contact met mensen uit alle geledingen van onze organisatie. Je verdiept je in de belangen van klanten, medewerkers en de organisatie, maar ook in de kaders door wet- en regelgeving en de ruimte die innovatieve automatiseringsmogelijkheden kunnen bieden. Zo kom je tot heldere procesontwerpen en -adviezen die naadloos aansluiten bij onze bedrijfsstrategie. Je begeleid projectteams bij het SAFe agile realiseren van procesverbeteringen, op basis van de veranderagenda die je opstelt. Bijvoorbeeld door het ontwikkelen van apps. Als een visionaire bruggenbouwer zorg je zo voor verandering en vooruitgang, zodat we als organisatie de uitdagingen van de energietransitie aankunnen. in deze functie krijg je alleen scherp krijgt waar n√π behoefte aan is, maar ook over een paar jaar. Je grootste uitdaging wordt ongetwijfeld prioriteren. Door de energietransitie groeit ons werkpakket namelijk gestaag en ondertussen verandert ook nog onze rol als netbeheerder. 
Functie-eisenZo pak jij het aan... Een rasechte verbinder met een resultaatgerichte aanpak en een verfrissende blik. Op inspirerende wijze zorg je voor draagvlak. Ze help je hele teams stap na stap te maken. Je voelt je thuis in een technische organisatie als de onze en verstaat de kunst op tijd afstand te nemen om in ons bedrijfsbelang te kunnen blijven handelen. Daarbij altijd rekening houdend met wat een verandering betekent voor onze organisatie, processen en systemen.Verder heb jij: Minimaal een hbo-diploma (bijvoorbeeld bedrijfskunde);Ervaring met het begeleiden en co√∂rdineren van verandertrajecten;Affiniteit met softwareontwikkeling;Kennis van en ervaring met procesmanagement, projectmatig werken en procesontwerpmethodieken (zoals lean, SAFe en agile werken).
Let op: vanwege onze veiligheidsvoorschriften is het bij onze functies verplicht om Nederlands taalniveau C1 te lezen, te spreken en te schrijven. Team & cultuurJe zet je schouders eronder met...Enexis Netbeheer, onderdeel van Enexis Groep, voorziet ruim 3 miljoen huishoudens en bedrijven in Nederland van elektriciteit en gas. Je komt bij ons binnen op een interessant moment. De energietransitie is namelijk in volle gang en dat merk je in elke vezel van onze organisatie. Slim onderhoud, energie terugleveren, aardgasvrij wonen, windenergie opwekken en ga zo nog maar even door, we werken er hard aan om het mogelijk te maken. Dat leidt tot allerlei processen waar jij een waardevolle bijdrage aan kunt leveren.Je gaat als Business Consultant werken in het ketenteam van een onze vier procesketens: Onderhoud en Storingen, Grootverbruik & Netten en Kleinverbruik. Binnen je ketenteam opereer je landelijk en werk je samen met productmanagers, senior consultants en andere business consultants. Reken maar vast op een betrokken club collega‚Äôs en veel vrijheid. Zo bieden we voor thuiswerken bijvoorbeeld alle ruimte. Wat krijg je van ons?En wij steken natuurlijk ook energie in jouIn ruil voor jouw energie zorgt Enexis goed voor je. Dit mag je verwachten: Een bruto maandsalaris tussen de ‚Ç¨ 3.854,- en ‚Ç¨ 7.308,- op basis van 40 uur per week. Dit is inclusief 10% persoonlijk budget en 10,7% dertiende maand. Je kunt deze budgetten flexibel inzetten, bijvoorbeeld voor extra verlofdagen. 8% vakantiegeld over je brutojaarsalaris. We dragen 70% bij aan je ABP Keuzepensioen. De mogelijkheid om je werkweek flexibel in te delen. We vinden een goede balans tussen werk en priv√© namelijk belangrijk. Dus als je ‚Äôs ochtends eerst de kinderen naar school wilt brengen of nog een rondje sportschool wilt doen, helemaal prima.Een jaarlijks vitaliteitsbudget van ‚Ç¨ 500,-. Bijvoorbeeld voor een sportabonnement of advies van een voedingscoach.Een kilometervergoeding en een mobiliteitskaart met een ov-abonnement 1e klas. Alle ruimte om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen. Dat is voor ons namelijk een topprioriteit. Dus wil je een opleiding of cursus volgen, dan is de kans groot dat we de kosten voor onze rekening nemen.
Werk als business controller aan het energienetwerk van morgenSolliciteer via de button onder aan deze pagina. Binnen twee weken ontvang je een reactie. Heb je vragen over de functie? Heb je vragen over de functie? Neem dan contact op met Evelien Bartels, corporate recruiter, via evelien.bartels@enexis.nl of 06 ‚Äì 11 87 05 59.Goed om te wetenNa je sollicitatie ontvang je een e-mail met meer informatie over de procedure. Meestal bestaat deze uit twee gesprekken: een eerste (online) gesprek met de manager en recruiter en een tweede gesprek met je toekomstige collega‚Äôs op locatie.Een screening is onderdeel van de sollicitatieprocedure. Deze kan bestaan uit een assessment, het opvragen van referenties en een Verklaring Omtrent het Gedrag (VOG). Hierover ontvang je meer informatie tijdens de procedure.

job_title: Consultant (m/f/d) - Allianz Consulting -Allianz Consulting -Technology Transformation & Strategy
job_description:
About the job
            
 
About Us / Who you will join: Allianz Consulting is the internal consulting division of the Allianz Group. Based in Munich, Paris, Milan, Barcelona, Trivandrum, Pune, Singapore, and New York, our dedicated global teams of over 500 consultants share a joint vision: to be the consulting partner of choice for Allianz Group core segments, transforming the future of Allianz from within. We bring deep industrial and functional expertise to fulfill our clients' needs, ranging from strategy, market management, sales and distribution, IT, organization, claims and operations to central functions and Agile methodologies.Allianz Consulting's structure focuses on competencies and delivery. Therefore, we are set-up in so called "practice areas" and "service clusters" that focus on the following topics:  Resilience & IT Excellence  Digital Ecosystems  Sales Excellence  Marketing & Customer Excellence  Agile@Allianz  Claims Excellence  Products & Pricing  Productivity Excellence  Finance Excellence & Strategy  Legal, Data Privacy & Compliance  People Excellence 
 Key responsibilities /  Y  ou will get to:   Facilitate the digital transformation and define the future strategic IT direction of our customers by contributing to projects in the areas of IT Decommissioning, Cloud Transformation, IT Resilience, IT Risk, IT Security, IT Governance, and getting IT Transformation done  Participate in team efforts to identify ideas for potential solutions to client needs and grow Allianz Consulting service offerings  Work with client teams, bearing responsibility for specific tasks, the quality of your deliverables and ensuring project milestones are reached  Assist the team in analyzing customer needs, and developing creative concepts and concrete measures for implementation  Contribute to business development and client pitches under the guidance of an Engagement Manager  Contribute to internal projects within Allianz Consulting, including internal knowledge sharing and team events  Be enabled by our mission ‚Äú Grow People for Allianz ‚Äù through clear and structured development paths and multiple career options within our consulting company and within Allianz 
 Key requirements / What we hope you bring:   University degree in a relevant discipline such as Engineering / Information Technologies / Business Administration or equivalent experience  Minimum 1 year of experience in management consulting or operational business as a Full-Time Employee  Solid experience in Project- and Program Management methods and techniques or process development or IT implementation / transformation  A passion for technology, innovation and trends  Self-starter with a delivery mindset to achieve business impact  Core technology skills in the domains of Cloud (AWS, Azure), IT Decommissioning (Application Management), IT Operating Model Design or IT Risk and Governance  An affinity for solving problems and a pronounced capacity for analytical thinking  Your desire to make a difference and your willingness to be coached  Your enthusiasm for working in a diverse and international team  Your excellent command of English that you will use when preparing and delivering presentations and reports  Your excellent command of German (C1 Level or higher) that you will use when working with our German-speaking clients  Your previously acquired skills in PowerPoint and Excel (can perform complex functions)  Your curiosity for or knowledge of insurance and financial services and project or change management tools and techniques 
 If you already have international experience, speak German or other languages, we would love to hear more!  Did we spark your interest? Apply now and join us. Let's care for tomorrow. Allianz Group is one of the most trusted insurance and asset management companies in the world. Caring for our employees, their ambitions, dreams and challenges, is what makes us a unique employer. Together we can build an environment where everyone feels empowered and has the confidence to explore, to grow and to shape a better future for our customers and the world around us. We at Allianz believe in a diverse and inclusive workforce and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We encourage you to bring your whole self to work, no matter where you are from, what you look like, who you love or what you believe in. We therefore welcome applications regardless of ethnicity or cultural background, age, gender, nationality, religion, disability or sexual orientation. Join us. Let's care for tomorrow.

About the job
            
 
Du willst deine Konzern- bzw. Beratungserfahrung nutzen, um f√ºr Unternehmen s√§mtlicher Industrien das Thema Sustainability weiterzuentwickeln? In bereichs√ºbergreifenden Teams √ºber alle Hierarchieebenen hinweg an der Entwicklung von Nachhaltigkeitsstrategien und deren Umsetzung in bestehende Strukturen und Prozesse arbeiten? Das ist genau dein Ding?Dann lebe deine Leidenschaft in einer Position, in der du Nachhaltigkeit fest im Gesch√§ftsmodell unserer Kunden verankerst und eindrucksvoll aufzeigst, welche enormen Erfolgs- und Wachstumspotenziale in Themen wie Circular Economy, ESG, Ressourceneffizienz, Lieferkettenoptimierung, Human Rights, erneuerbare Energien und Low Carbon Technologies stecken.Das erwartet dichDu planst und begleitest unternehmensweite Ver√§nderungsprogramme, optimierst Gesch√§ftsprozesse und entwickelst neue Gesch√§ftsmodelle. In der Projektarbeit nutzt du dein Know-how in einem von drei Kernthemen: Circular Economy, Low Carbon Economy und Sustainable Valuation.Circular Economy: Wenn du schon Circular-Economy-L√∂sungen f√ºr Organisationen konzipiert und umgesetzt hast, unterst√ºtzt du Circular-Economy-Strategien, Ma√ünahmen f√ºr erh√∂hte Ressourceneffizienz oder die Optimierung und Neukonfiguration von Lieferketten und Gesch√§ftsmodellen. Low Carbon Economy: Du hast dich bereits mit der Energiewende auseinandergesetzt? Dann besch√§ftigst du dich bei uns mit den gesch√§ftlichen Auswirkungen eines der folgenden Themen: Einkauf/Nutzung erneuerbarer Energien, Ladeinfrastruktur, Speicherl√∂sungen oder neue Gesch√§ftsmodelle f√ºr die E-Mobilit√§t sowie Low-Carbon-Produktinnovationen. Sustainable Valuation: Du verstehst die gesch√§ftlichen Vorteile des nachhaltigen Wirtschaftens und wei√üt, dass neben den offensichtlichen Effizienzgewinnen signifikante Wachstums- und Differenzierungschancen bestehen? Dann nutze dein methodisches Wissen, um diese Chancen der Nachhaltigkeit in Zahlen darzustellen und unsere Klienten so bei der strategischen Entscheidungsfindung und in der Kommunikation mit Investoren zu unterst√ºtzen. Dar√ºber hinaus nutzt du dein Fachwissen und deine kreativen Ideen, um potenzielle Kunden von einer Zusammenarbeit mit uns zu √ºberzeugen. Darauf freuen wir uns√úberdurchschnittlich guter Universit√§tsabschluss (Zusatzqualifikation in Form von MBA oder Promotion von Vorteil) Mehrj√§hrige Berufspraxis in der Strategieberatung oder in einer strategischen Funktion eines renommierten Industrieunternehmens inklusive (Teil-)Projekt- und fachlicher Teamleitung Erfahrung in einem der oben genannten Schwerpunktthemen (Circular Economy, Low Carbon Economy, Sustainability Valuation) und sehr gutes Know-how in betriebswirtschaftlichen Prozessen Interesse an Technologie- und Digitalisierungsthemen und deren Einbindung in die Gesch√§ftsstrategie Die F√§higkeit, Prozesse im Sinne des Kunden zu durchleuchten, Verbesserungspotenziale aufzuzeigen und Probleme ideenreich zu l√∂senWas wir dir bietenFlexibles ArbeitszeitmodellUmfangreiche Angebote f√ºr Fort- und WeiterbildungEine Arbeitskultur, die Diversit√§t und Inklusion f√∂rdertUmfassende Unterst√ºtzung in der ElternzeitAttraktive AufstiegschancenDu und AccentureIn dieser Rolle bist du Teil von Accenture Strategy & Consulting. Der aktuelle Wandel er√∂ffnet Unternehmen zuvor nie dagewesene Chancen. Wir helfen unseren Kunden, diese umfassend auszusch√∂pfen und sich neu zu erfinden. Mit ganzheitlichen Strategien, gest√ºtzt auf #Datenanalysen und #KI.Bei Accenture arbeiten Menschen, die Einfluss nehmen wollen auf die Welt von morgen. Sie haben sich f√ºr das f√ºhrende Beratungsunternehmen in Digitalisierung, Cloud und Security entschieden, weil sie Dinge ansto√üen wollen, Grenzen verschieben und im Team aufgehen m√∂chten. Und weil sie fasziniert sind von Technologie und was wir damit ver√§ndern k√∂nnen.Dein Kontakt Du hast Fragen? Dann wende dich an unser Recruiting Team per E-Mail an recruiting_germany@accenture.com oder telefonisch unter 00800 45045045.Wir freuen uns auf deine Bewerbung!

About the job
            
 
Wat ga je doenAls Business Consultant ben je de sparringpartner op C-level, bij organisaties in verschillende branches. Door jouw kennis weet je snel inzicht te verkrijgen in de kern van de uitdaging die de klant heeft. Op basis van de huidige situatie, de organisatiedoelen en jouw visie ben je in staat een passend organisatiemodel en KPI-besturingsmodel te bedenken dat leidt tot focus en betere prestaties. Denk hierbij aan de herinrichting van teams, het veranderen van KPI‚Äôs en het verbeteren van processen.Met jouw kennis en bevlogenheid cre√´er je in alle lagen van de organisatie draagvlak voor de veranderingen. Ook zorg je voor de implementatie van het besturingsmodel en de nieuwe manier van werken. Zo wordt er daadwerkelijk vanuit een eenduidig besturingskader door de managers geacteerd. Jij weet de kennisontwikkeling van het gehele team een boost te geven door jouw expertise.Wie zijn wijHot ITem gelooft in wendbare, datagedreven organisaties die de concurrentie voorblijven door zich snel te kunnen aanpassen aan nieuwe ontwikkelingen. Alles wat wij doen heeft tot doel om de performance van mensen, afdelingen en organisaties onderscheidend te verbeteren. Dit doen wij samen met onze klanten, op basis van kwalitatief goede data en inzicht in de cruciale zaken.Al ruim 25 jaar ervaren we dat onze filosofie √©cht werkt. We staan voor een scherpe aanpak waarin we doorbraken cre√´ren op het gebied van prestatieverbetering en rusten niet tot de baten zijn ge√Øncasseerd door de klant.Wat bieden wij Een salaris passend bij jouw ervaring en expertiseEen contract voor onbepaalde tijd met mogelijkheid tot parttime werkenEen leasebudget en bonusregelingLaptop en telefoon van de zaakOnkostenvergoeding √©n internetvergoedingSabbatical opties en een goede pensioenregeling27 vakantiedagen en 2 prestatieverlofdagenAandacht voor een persoonlijk ontwikkelingsplan en veel mogelijkheden om kennis uit te bouwen via cursussen, trainingen en opleidingenFlexibel werken: regie over je eigen werktijden - naast thuis en bij de klant, bieden we je een goed bereikbare werkplek in Amsterdam met een prachtig uitzicht over het IJWekelijkse stoelmassage, een gym, Hot ITem sloep, dakterras en caf√© waar je altijd even een praatje kunt maken met je collega‚Äôs
Wat breng jij mee HBO/WO werk- en denkniveauOvertuigingskracht, communicatieve vaardigheden, flexibiliteit en inlevingsvermogenAnalytische vaardigheden, klantgerichtheid en organisatiebewustzijnMinimaal 5 jaar ervaring in een soortgelijke rol van Business ConsultantAffiniteit met factbased besturing en data-oplossingenAmbitie om klanten naar een hoger plan te tillen, samen met je teamUitstekende kennis van de Nederlandse taal

About the job
            
 
Business ConsultantDit IT-adviesbureau is gespecialiseerd in Kennismanagement en Digitale transformatie binnen de kennisgebieden BPM, Linked Data en business- en informatieanalyse. Dagelijks werken circa 30 consultants aan mooie en vernieuwende projecten. Het betekent samenwerken met collega‚Äôs uit verschillende kennisgebieden om succesvol aan grote projecten te kunnen werken. De organisatie biedt een volledige end-to-end dienstverlening om digitale transformaties te begeleiden (van analyse tot implementatie).De organisatie is in haar groei en ontwikkeling op zoek naar Business Consultants ter versterking van het teamOmschrijvingAls Business Consultant heb je je kennis en ervaring opgedaan in het speelveld van ICT Project Management, Analyse, Architectuur of Low Code Development. In deze rol werk je deeltijds mee aan projecten voor onder andere Overheid, Financi√´n en Logistiek in dit vakgebied. Voor de organisatie zelf, werk je mee aan de business ontwikkeling van de organisatie in de vorm van inhoudelijke ondersteuning bij Productontwikkeling, Aanbestedingen, strategieontwikkeling etc.Je hebt het volgende profiel HBO/WO werk- en denkniveauKennis en ervaring binnen de domeinen Overheid, Banken/Verzekeringen of Vervoer is een preKennis en ervaring kan komen vanuit verschillende rollen: ICT Projectmanagement,Informatie Analist, Business Analist, Proces Analist, ICT ArchitectSolution Architect, Low code als Mendix-, Oracle Apex of PEGA Consultant,Ervaring met adviseringopdrachten (intern of extern) is een pre.
Als persoon ben je een bouwer, deel je graag je kennis met collega‚Äôs en klanten, je gaat voor kwaliteit en bent een echte teamspeler.Aanbod  Een uitdagende baan als Business Consultant waarbij je rol krijgt in de verdere opbouw van de organisatie;Een prettige en persoonlijke werkomgeving;Veel ruimte voor persoonlijke inbreng en initiatief;Contract voor onbepaalde tijd;Goed opleidingsbudget;Uitgebreid mobiliteitsbudget;Uitgebreid voordelenpakket incl. bonus, pensioen

job_title: Strategy Consultant (Customer Transformation, Digital Transformation, Business Design) (ICH Europe)
job_description:
About the job
            
 



      This job is sourced from a job board.
      Learn More



Strategy Consultant (Customer Transformation, Digital Transformation, Business Design) (ICH Europe)Your Responsibilities Work with multinational teams to deliver world-class business strategy solutions for the leading companies Help define strategic visions, market entry/go-to-market strategies, customer growth strategies, digital strategies and new business models, products and services that address today‚Äôs business needs and future growth. Co-lead business design activities, including client workshops, stakeholder interviews, business intelligence gathering, creative brainstorms, visioning, and KPI development. Identify & assess digital solutions & applications required to achieve strategic goals & capture new opportunities Assess the business case for new strategic & investment opportunities Build and manage client relationships and provide relevant sector insights and experience related to business strategy development Continuously grow yourself and help grow the Growth, Pricing & Corporate Strategy team: participate in the training, actively share your knowledge, manage junior members of the Strategy team and groom them for more responsibility. Conceptualize, design, and build re-usable components around the practices to help accelerate the development of the Intelligent Consulting Hub 
Our Requirements Master‚Äôs degree or equivalent, preferably in business/management/e-business At least 3 years of relevant experience in either telco, travel, resources (natural resources, oil&gas upstream, utilities, chemicals) industry, international exposure is a strong asset Experienced in either CRM, marketing, sales, service processes (B2C and/or B2B), digital strategy and/or transformation, preferably in strategy related roles or in strategy consulting Problem-solving skills including the ability to structure client challenges, perform analyses independently & deal with new issues in dynamic work environments Ability to articulate complex problems and solutions in a simple, logical, and powerful manner Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. Other foreign EU languages e.g. German, French, Spanish is a strong asset Familiar with Design Thinking methodology will be additional value Ability and willingness to travel internationally to Clients‚Äô premises for short- and long-term assignments (Middle East & Europe) 
What We Offer Challenging job in a dynamic, professional, international, and multicultural environment Opportunity to gain exceptional on global market, skills, knowledge, and experience on large scale international projects The unique chance to work in a global network using only state-of-the-art tools and technologies One-of-a-kind experiences with best know-how, with broad access to certifications and professional industry-recognized trainings. Very attractive and competitive salary as well as a well-defined career path shaped to the individuals career focus & priorities Attractive benefits package: Remote/Hybrid way of work, Cafeteria System, Multisport card, Lunch card, Private medical care, Employee Assistance Program, 100% paid sick leave, AMEX Gold Card, Lounge Club Priority Pass, Life insurance, Employee referral program and much more‚Ä¶

Intelligent Consulting Hub‚ÄØis a part of Europe Strategy & Consulting‚ÄØpractice, pulling together multinational and cross-cultural professionals based at key locations across Europe. No matter what business, no matter where in the world, our unrivaled industry and function experts help our Clients to shape the future creating clearly defined, measurable value. We are delivering on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Our Poland part of ICH Consulting Hub is located in Warsaw, Krak√≥w, Wroc≈Çaw, ≈Å√≥d≈∫ and Gda≈Ñsk. Your impact will be truly global as you will leverage an unmatched network of people, knowledge, tools and technologies and work alongside some of the best thinkers in the market.‚ÄúJoin our world class capabilities‚ÄØand experience unique opportunities to grow your skills with us.‚Äù‚ÄØ‚Äì‚ÄØMa≈Çgorzata Nasi≈Çowska, ICH Consulting Hub LeadAccenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. With our thought leadership and culture of innovation, we apply industry expertise, diverse skill sets and next-generation technology to each business challenge.We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.‚ÄúAcross the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.‚Äù ‚Äì Julie Sweet, Accenture CEOWorking conditions Employment contract (Umowa o pracƒô)Headquarter in‚ÄØWarsaw with offices in Krak√≥w, Wroc≈Çaw, ≈Å√≥d≈∫ and Gda≈Ñsk.We are delivering our work mostly remotely but knowing that Intelligent Consulting Hub Europe (ICH) way of working is also based on traveling and serving advisory, typically working closely with our Clients in their offices, willingness and ability to work at client‚Äôs locations mostly across Europe, but also other locations, for short or long term is still required.
